name: Ancient
text: After the agricultural revolution around the world, unique civilizations were formed in various regions. You are in a position to lead the people of this civilization. First, let people know the way of your civilization!

choices.text: Hail to the King! Hail to the Civilization!
We resolve all issues through discussion and co-prosper peacefully.

triggeredUniques: Gain enough Faith for [6]% of a Great Prophet

choices.text: There are many wonderful things in this world that we don't know about.

name: Classical
text: After many discoveries, your civilization has grown into a city. Excellent scholarship and literature are developing! Show citizens your country's philosophy.

choices.text: The king is like a god. No one should go against the king.
triggeredUniques: Gain a free [Production Bonus] [in capital] <hidden from users>

choices.text: The people should rule the city.
